Review: Notifications are not dismissed when the app is closed on Android 12. When you close the app, the static notification that allows you to navigate your current album/playlist should be dismissed. This prevents accidentally starting music via the notification, which can be VERY annoying and disruptive. And no, I shouldn't have to manually dismiss the notification every time I close Spotify. When I close an app, it should be obvious that I don't want to use that app anymore.
